targets.rawSql:
select grid_voltage_r, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select inverter_status, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select total_yield as self_use,uploadDate as `time`
FROM solax.solax_daily
WHERE $__timeFilter(uploadDate)

select (total_yield-feed_in) as self_use,uploadDate as `time`
FROM solax.solax_daily
WHERE $__timeFilter(uploadDate)

select battery_capacity as "Available"  , uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local 
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1

select dc_solar_power, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select feed_in_power, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select grid_voltage_s, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select time_count_down, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

SELECT 	feed_in  as feedinenergy, uploadDate as `time`
FROM solax.solax_daily
WHERE $__timeFilter(uploadDate)
;

select (inverter_ac_power-feed_in_power) as Consumption, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select battery_power, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

select grid_voltage_t, uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local
where uploadTime > now(3) - INTERVAL 2 MINUTE
order by uploadTime desc
limit 1
;

SELECT 	(max(consumeenergy) - min(consumeenergy))  as consumeenergy, uploadTime as `time`
FROM solax.solax_local
WHERE $__timeFilter(uploadTime)

select `battery_capacity` as "Battery Charge"  , uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local

select `feed_in_power` as "Grid"  , uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local

select `dc_solar_power` as "Solar", uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local

select `battery_power` as "Battery", uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local

select (inverter_ac_power-feed_in_power) as "Consumption", uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_local

select sum(total_yield-feed_in) as Self_Use, uploadDate as `time`
from solax.solax_daily
group by year(uploadDate), month(uploadDate)

select sum(feed_in) as Feed_In, uploadDate as `time`
from solax.solax_daily
group by year(uploadDate), month(uploadDate)

SELECT 	(max(consumeenergy) - min(consumeenergy))  as From_Grid, DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(uploadTime),INTERVAL DAY(LAST_DAY(uploadTime))-1 DAY) as `time`
FROM solax.solax_local
group by year(uploadTime), month(uploadTime)
;

select `peps1` as "EPS 1"  , uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_stats

select `peps2` as "EPS 2"  , uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_stats

select (`peps3`) as "EPS 3", uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_stats

select (`peps3`+`peps2`+`peps1`) as "EPS Total", uploadTime as `time`
from solax.solax_stats

current.text: rec_datetime between date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 2 day) and now();
current.value: rec_datetime between date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 2 day) and now();

list.label: limit_condition
list.name: limit_condition

options.text: rec_datetime between date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 2 day) and now();
options.value: rec_datetime between date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 2 day) and now();

list.query: rec_datetime between date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 2 day) and now();
